REQUEST for historical curve informationPer our conversation this morning I would appreciate the following historical curve information as soon as possible On February what was the summer strip for Vent to ML Demarc to ML and Vent to Chicago On July what was the August strip for Vent to Chicago On May what was the May strip for Vent to Chicago On May what was the June strip for Vent to Chicago On June what was July Strip for Vent to Chicago On Sep what was the October strip for Vent to ML Thank you in advance for your prompt attention to this matter Please call me if you have any questions Thanks again Mike Barry
